en.label: Athasian Calendar (Dark Sun)
en.description: The harsh calendar of the dying world of Athas from the Dark Sun D&D setting. Features a complex system of named years that cycle through 77 different combinations, with intercalary periods marking the deadly seasonal extremes.

months.name: Scorch
months.description: The beginning of the annual heat cycle when the brutal Athasian sun starts its merciless assault on the dying world.

months.name: Morrow
months.description: The month that follows Scorch, when hope for survival becomes increasingly desperate under the relentless heat.

months.name: Rest
months.description: A brief respite in the cycle, though on Athas even 'rest' means struggling against the hostile environment.

months.name: Gather
months.description: The time for gathering what little sustenance can be found in the harsh wasteland before the sun's power peaks.

months.name: Breeze
months.description: Named ironically, as any 'breeze' on Athas carries scorching heat and the dust of a world slowly dying.

months.name: Mist
months.description: The month of rare atmospheric moisture, though even mist on Athas often brings more suffering than relief.

months.name: Bloom
months.description: The cruel irony of bloom time on Athas, where few things flourish and those that do are often as dangerous as they are rare.

months.name: Haze
months.description: The month when shimmering heat distorts the already nightmarish landscape of the dying world.

months.name: Hoard
months.description: The desperate time of hoarding whatever resources can be found before the sun reaches its most lethal intensity.

months.name: Wind
months.description: The month of searing winds that strip moisture from the land and flesh alike in the endless Athasian desert.

months.name: Sorrow
months.description: The month that embodies the despair of Athas, when the weight of survival crushes hope from even the strongest souls.

months.name: Smolder
months.description: The final month before the sun's peak fury, when the very air seems to burn and the world smolders in anticipation.

weekdays.name: 1 Day
weekdays.description: First day of the Athasian week, when survivors plan their struggle against the hostile world

weekdays.name: 2 Day
weekdays.description: Second day of the week, often devoted to scavenging for the resources needed to survive

weekdays.name: 3 Day
weekdays.description: Third day of the week, when the harshness of Athas weighs heaviest on its inhabitants

weekdays.name: 4 Day
weekdays.description: Fourth day of the week, marking the midpoint of the struggle to survive another week

weekdays.name: 5 Day
weekdays.description: Fifth day of the week, when thoughts turn to defending what little has been gained

weekdays.name: 6 Day
weekdays.description: Sixth and final day of the Athasian week, offering no true rest, only preparation for the next cycle

intercalary.name: Cooling Sun
intercalary.description: A five-day period when the sun's killing heat allegedly lessens. Even this 'cooling' would be deadly on any other world, but on Athas it represents a brief chance for survival and preparation.

intercalary.name: Soaring Sun
intercalary.description: Five days when the sun reaches one of its peaks of deadly intensity. A time of seeking shelter and enduring the worst that Athas can unleash upon its unfortunate inhabitants.

intercalary.name: Highest Sun
intercalary.description: The most dreaded five days of the Athasian year when the sun reaches its absolute peak of killing power. Even the strongest creatures seek shelter from this ultimate test of survival.
